entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 09:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
